name: Jump Dog
description:
Bounce between platforms! Try to reach the green platform at the top without falling down!

Controls

Keyboard: Use the left and right arrow keys, or A and D to control the dog.

Touchscreen: Touch/press the side of the screen you want the dog to go. Play in portrait mode if you really want to be challenged!

Resources

Dog & Platforms: DALL·E

Cityscape: https://www.wallpaperflare.com/buildings-illustration-animated-pink-and-black-bu...

Jump (jump 3): https://opengameart.org/content/platformer-jumping-sounds
